MA	<p>9af1_2430</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 18 and 20.This means that a segment of chromosome 18 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 20 without any gain or loss of genetic material. While balanced translocations typically do not affect the individual's phenotype, they can result in different types of gametes during reproduction.</p><p><ul><li><strong>Chromosome Pair:</strong> 18, 20</li><li><strong>Segregation Type:</strong> alternate</li></ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; MA	<p>80ac_592e</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 8 and 18.This means that a segment of chromosome 8 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 18 without any gain or loss of genetic material. While balanced translocations typically do not affect the individual's phenotype, they can result in different types of gametes during reproduction.</p><p><ul><li><strong>Chromosome Pair:</strong> 8, 18</li><li><strong>Segregation Type:</strong> adjacent-2</li></ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; MA	<p>c32c_8032</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 12 and 13.This means that a segment of chromosome 12 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 13 without any gain or loss of genetic material. MA	<p>af1e_0aec</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 12 and 19.This means that a segment of chromosome 12 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 19 without any gain or loss of genetic material. While balanced translocations typically do not affect the individual's phenotype, they can result in different types of gametes during reproduction.</p><p><ul><li><strong>Chromosome Pair:</strong> 12, 19</li><li><strong>Segregation Type:</strong> adjacent-1</li></ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; MA	<p>fca5_081e</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 2 and 21.This means that a segment of chromosome 2 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 21 without any gain or loss of genetic material. While balanced translocations typically do not affect the individual's phenotype, they can result in different types of gametes during reproduction.</p><p><ul><li><strong>Chromosome Pair:</strong> 2, 21</li><li><strong>Segregation Type:</strong> alternate</li></ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; MA	<p>c32c_bac2</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 12 and 13.This means that a segment of chromosome 12 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 13 without any gain or loss of genetic material. MA	<p>43d3_a871</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 16 and 18.This means that a segment of chromosome 16 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 18 without any gain or loss of genetic material. While balanced translocations typically do not affect the individual's phenotype, they can result in different types of gametes during reproduction.</p><p><ul><li><strong>Chromosome Pair:</strong> 16, 18</li><li><strong>Segregation Type:</strong> adjacent-2</li></ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; MA	<p>6570_99f5</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 11 and 20.This means that a segment of chromosome 11 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 20 without any gain or loss of genetic material. While balanced translocations typically do not affect the individual's phenotype, they can result in different types of gametes during reproduction.</p><p><ul><li><strong>Chromosome Pair:</strong> 11, 20</li><li><strong>Segregation Type:</strong> adjacent-2</li></ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; MA	<p>420e_056f</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 6 and 22.This means that a segment of chromosome 6 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 22 without any gain or loss of genetic material. While balanced translocations typically do not affect the individual's phenotype, they can result in different types of gametes during reproduction.</p><p><ul><li><strong>Chromosome Pair:</strong> 6, 22</li><li><strong>Segregation Type:</strong> alternate</li></ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; MA	<p>5022_22b9</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 5 and 20.This means that a segment of chromosome 5 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 20 without any gain or loss of genetic material. While balanced translocations typically do not affect the individual's phenotype, they can result in different types of gametes during reproduction.</p><p><ul><li><strong>Chromosome Pair:</strong> 5, 20</li><li><strong>Segregation Type:</strong> adjacent-2</li></ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; MA	<p>5c44_4e80</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 18 and 22.This means that a segment of chromosome 18 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 22 without any gain or loss of genetic material. While balanced translocations typically do not affect the individual's phenotype, they can result in different types of gametes during reproduction.</p><p><ul><li><strong>Chromosome Pair:</strong> 18, 22</li><li><strong>Segregation Type:</strong> adjacent-2</li></ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; MA	<p>827a_af65</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 18 and 19.This means that a segment of chromosome 18 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 19 without any gain or loss of genetic material. MA	<p>c73d_6a19</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 1 and 7.This means that a segment of chromosome 1 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 7 without any gain or loss of genetic material. While balanced translocations typically do not affect the individual's phenotype, they can result in different types of gametes during reproduction.</p><p><ul><li><strong>Chromosome Pair:</strong> 1, 7</li><li><strong>Segregation Type:</strong> alternate</li></ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; MA	<p>43c2_9f26</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 10 and 15.This means that a segment of chromosome 10 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 15 without any gain or loss of genetic material. While balanced translocations typically do not affect the individual's phenotype, they can result in different types of gametes during reproduction.</p><p><ul><li><strong>Chromosome Pair:</strong> 10, 15</li><li><strong>Segregation Type:</strong> alternate</li></ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; MA	<p>323e_d83b</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 18 and 21.This means that a segment of chromosome 18 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 21 without any gain or loss of genetic material. MA	<p>7c42_9c12</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 3 and 15.This means that a segment of chromosome 3 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 15 without any gain or loss of genetic material. While balanced translocations typically do not affect the individual's phenotype, they can result in different types of gametes during reproduction.</p><p><ul><li><strong>Chromosome Pair:</strong> 3, 15</li><li><strong>Segregation Type:</strong> adjacent-1</li></ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; MA	<p>02bf_06ad</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 15 and 17.This means that a segment of chromosome 15 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 17 without any gain or loss of genetic material. While balanced translocations typically do not affect the individual's phenotype, they can result in different types of gametes during reproduction.</p><p><ul><li><strong>Chromosome Pair:</strong> 15, 17</li><li><strong>Segregation Type:</strong> adjacent-1</li></ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; MA	<p>1449_e18b</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. MA	<p>052f_8538</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 6 and 22.This means that a segment of chromosome 6 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 22 without any gain or loss of genetic material. MA	<p>9af1_19ae</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 18 and 20.This means that a segment of chromosome 18 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 20 without any gain or loss of genetic material. MA	<p>18b2_3888</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. MA	<p>8e4a_2046</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 12 and 22.This means that a segment of chromosome 12 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 22 without any gain or loss of genetic material. MA	<p>0b99_53ca</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. While balanced translocations typically do not affect the individual's phenotype, they can result in different types of gametes during reproduction.</p><p><ul><li><strong>Chromosome Pair:</strong> 12, 21</li><li><strong>Segregation Type:</strong> alternate</li></ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 6 and 16.This means that a segment of chromosome 6 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 16 without any gain or loss of genetic material. MA	<p>df2e_d6e6</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 17 and 18.This means that a segment of chromosome 17 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 18 without any gain or loss of genetic material. While balanced translocations typically do not affect the individual's phenotype, they can result in different types of gametes during reproduction.</p><p><ul><li><strong>Chromosome Pair:</strong> 17, 18</li><li><strong>Segregation Type:</strong> adjacent-1</li></ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; MA	<p>1644_cefe</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 2 and 8.This means that a segment of chromosome 2 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 8 without any gain or loss of genetic material. While balanced translocations typically do not affect the individual's phenotype, they can result in different types of gametes during reproduction.</p><p><ul><li><strong>Chromosome Pair:</strong> 2, 8</li><li><strong>Segregation Type:</strong> adjacent-1</li></ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; MA	<p>4373_86d8</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 8 and 21.This means that a segment of chromosome 8 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 21 without any gain or loss of genetic material. While balanced translocations typically do not affect the individual's phenotype, they can result in different types of gametes during reproduction.</p><p><ul><li><strong>Chromosome Pair:</strong> 8, 21</li><li><strong>Segregation Type:</strong> adjacent-1</li></ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; MA	<p>bf80_4dcd</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 10 and 15.This means that a segment of chromosome 10 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 15 without any gain or loss of genetic material. While balanced translocations typically do not affect the individual's phenotype, they can result in different types of gametes during reproduction.</p><p><ul><li><strong>Chromosome Pair:</strong> 10, 15</li><li><strong>Segregation Type:</strong> adjacent-2</li></ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; MA	<p>4f80_a32c</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 6 and 20.This means that a segment of chromosome 6 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 20 without any gain or loss of genetic material. While balanced translocations typically do not affect the individual's phenotype, they can result in different types of gametes during reproduction.</p><p><ul><li><strong>Chromosome Pair:</strong> 6, 20</li><li><strong>Segregation Type:</strong> adjacent-1</li></ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; MA	<p>9b80_ebb6</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 7 and 14.This means that a segment of chromosome 7 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 14 without any gain or loss of genetic material. While balanced translocations typically do not affect the individual's phenotype, they can result in different types of gametes during reproduction.</p><p><ul><li><strong>Chromosome Pair:</strong> 7, 14</li><li><strong>Segregation Type:</strong> alternate</li></ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; MA	<p>2778_a7f0</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 8 and 14.This means that a segment of chromosome 8 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 14 without any gain or loss of genetic material. While balanced translocations typically do not affect the individual's phenotype, they can result in different types of gametes during reproduction.</p><p><ul><li><strong>Chromosome Pair:</strong> 8, 14</li><li><strong>Segregation Type:</strong> adjacent-1</li></ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; MA	<p>c000_af7f</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 11 and 12.This means that a segment of chromosome 11 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 12 without any gain or loss of genetic material. While balanced translocations typically do not affect the individual's phenotype, they can result in different types of gametes during reproduction.</p><p><ul><li><strong>Chromosome Pair:</strong> 11, 12</li><li><strong>Segregation Type:</strong> alternate</li></ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; MA	<p>90d6_098b</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 13 and 14.This means that a segment of chromosome 13 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 14 without any gain or loss of genetic material. While balanced translocations typically do not affect the individual's phenotype, they can result in different types of gametes during reproduction.</p><p><ul><li><strong>Chromosome Pair:</strong> 13, 14</li><li><strong>Segregation Type:</strong> adjacent-2</li></ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; MA	<p>e549_330b</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 14 and 17.This means that a segment of chromosome 14 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 17 without any gain or loss of genetic material. While balanced translocations typically do not affect the individual's phenotype, they can result in different types of gametes during reproduction.</p><p><ul><li><strong>Chromosome Pair:</strong> 14, 17</li><li><strong>Segregation Type:</strong> adjacent-1</li></ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; MA	<p>cf94_25ae</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 17 and 19.This means that a segment of chromosome 17 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 19 without any gain or loss of genetic material. MA	<p>1d3a_5fd0</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 19 and 22.This means that a segment of chromosome 19 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 22 without any gain or loss of genetic material. While balanced translocations typically do not affect the individual's phenotype, they can result in different types of gametes during reproduction.</p><p><ul><li><strong>Chromosome Pair:</strong> 19, 22</li><li><strong>Segregation Type:</strong> alternate</li></ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; MA	<p>95ea_08f4</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 15 and 22.This means that a segment of chromosome 15 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 22 without any gain or loss of genetic material. MA	<p>302d_39a1</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 11 and 22.This means that a segment of chromosome 11 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 22 without any gain or loss of genetic material. While balanced translocations typically do not affect the individual's phenotype, they can result in different types of gametes during reproduction.</p><p><ul><li><strong>Chromosome Pair:</strong> 11, 22</li><li><strong>Segregation Type:</strong> alternate</li></ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; MA	<p>91fe_3519</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 20 and 22.This means that a segment of chromosome 20 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 22 without any gain or loss of genetic material. MA	<p>58bb_d69e</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 5 and 12.This means that a segment of chromosome 5 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 12 without any gain or loss of genetic material. MA	<p>230f_c71c</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 18 and 19.This means that a segment of chromosome 18 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 19 without any gain or loss of genetic material. MA	<p>31be_4646</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 2 and 9.This means that a segment of chromosome 2 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 9 without any gain or loss of genetic material. MA	<p>d412_3884</p> <p>A phenotypically <i>wildtype</i> prospective couple seeks genetic counseling. The man has a <strong>balanced translocation</strong>, between chromosomes 3 and 19.This means that a segment of chromosome 3 has been exchanged with a segment of chromosome 19 without any gain or loss of genetic material. While balanced translocations typically do not affect the individual's phenotype, they can result in different types of gametes during reproduction.</p><p><ul><li><strong>Chromosome Pair:</strong> 3, 19</li><li><strong>Segregation Type:</strong> alternate</li></ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; border: 0px solid white;"><tr> <td align="left"><table style="border-collapse: collapse; border: 0px solid white; height: 30px"><colgroup width="202.4"></colgroup><colgroup width="32"></colgroup><colgroup width="240.8"></colgroup><tr><td bgcolor="crimson" style="border: 2px solid black;" align="center"><span style="font-size: small"></span></td><td bgcolor="lightsalmon" style="border: 4px solid black;" align="center">3</td><td bgcolor="crimson" style="border: 2px solid black;" align="center"><span style="font-size: large"></span></td></tr></table></td></tr><tr> <td align="left"><table style="border-collapse: collapse;
